definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: The methamphetamine "pervitin" is one of the most widespread drugs in the area because of ease of availability.
sentences.chinese: 脫氧麻黃鹼在當地可以輕易獲得，因而氾濫成災。

sentences.english: In this article a new kind of inclusion complex involving carbenoxolone sodium and pseduoephedrine was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 合成了甘珀酸鈉和右旋麻黃鹼的包合物。

sentences.english: The State practices monopoly for the purchase and marketing of ephedrine.
sentences.chinese: 國家對麻黃素實行統購統銷。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ephedrine injected intravenously can decrease the level of anesthesia .
sentences.chinese: 結論靜脈注射麻黃鹼可減淺麻醉深度。
加強麻黃素的經營管理。

sentences.english: The number of theory plates was not less than 2000 determined by the peaks of Ephedrine hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 理論板數按鹽痠麻黃鹼峯計算應不低於2000。

sentences.english: Protein precipitation was accomplished by the addition of methanol.
sentences.chinese: 血漿樣品用甲醇沉澱蛋白提取鹽痠麻黃鹼。

sentences.english: Take bitter orange extract, a substance that has replaced ephedra as an ingredient in many weight-loss supplements.
sentences.chinese: 苦橙提取物在很多減肥補充劑中都已經取代了麻黃。

sentences.english: Some people died because of overtrain and overdosage of Ephedrine.
sentences.chinese: 有些人死於因訓練過度和過量的麻黃鹼。
規範麻黃素的使用管理。

sentences.english: The yield of Lentinula edodes cultivated with sawdust of Casuarina equisetifolia cut in short rotation was 0.
sentences.chinese: 短輪伐期木麻黃木屑栽培香菇的產量是每袋0。

sentences.english: Speculation and transfer of certificates for ephedrine purchase and use shall be prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 禁止倒賣和轉讓麻黃素購用證明。

sentences.english: So Fan prescribed twenty four grams of ephedra (Mahuang), and told his father to boil it.
sentences.chinese: 故範文甫開二十四克麻黃，讓費父爲子煎服。

sentences.english: This is the first study large enough to confirm the link that meth kills by causing strokes.
sentences.chinese: 這是首個足夠大樣本來確認麻黃鹼與中風關聯的研究。

sentences.english: No unit or individual without appointment shall operate ephedrine business.
sentences.chinese: 未經指定的任何單位和個人，不得經營麻黃素業務。

sentences.english: The State practices license control system for the export of ephedrine.
sentences.chinese: 國家對麻黃素的出口實行許可證管理制度。

definition: black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
